title: 1888 Goodwin / Old Judge Cigarettes Ad Card

posts.post_title: 1888 Goodwin / Old Judge Cigarettes Ad Card
posts.post_content:
Some creasing and discoloration, but it displays well. Hoping to get $85 net to me, shipping included. Will consider offers. It will be shipped flat, carefully packaged and fully insured. 

Images are here: 

Front: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aO1q5phFVLDdh-RVVLpU6gERGkkWgxSr/view?usp=sharing[/url]

Back: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WoIHDlANDqDKOi7wXC5Tlwx-6bWrAQuB/view?usp=sharing[/url]

Let me know if you'd like additional photos and I'll gladly take them.
